page.syntax: L MoveRow( MoveTo as N, MoveFrom as N [, ItemsToCopy as N = 1])
page.description: Move a block of one or more row items within the collection of rows.

argument.name: MoveTo
argument.description: The row index to which the rows with be moved.

argument.name: MoveFrom
argument.description: The row number specifying the first row to move. Multiple rows can be moved by specifying the *[xb:ItemsToCopy]*.

argument.name: ItemsToCopy
argument.description: Optional. Default value is 1. Number of rows to move starting with the *[xb:MoveFrom]* row.

page.discussion: Removes a block of ItemsToCopy rows beginning at the row indexed by MoveFrom and places them before the row indexed by MoveTo. Returns true if the rows were moved successfully and false if an error occurred.
